[Jaivardhan Kapoor](https://jaivardhankapoor.com) started his PhD in September 2021 and is co-advised by Christian Baumgartner and [Jakob Macke](https://uni-tuebingen.de/forschung/forschungsschwerpunkte/exzellenzcluster-maschinelles-lernen/forschung/forschung/cluster-arbeitsgruppen/professuren/ml-in-der-wissenschaft/).  He is an International Max Planck Research School for Intelligent Systems (IMPRS-IS) scholar. Before joining the University of Tübingen, he received his Bachelors and Masters degree in Electrical Engineering from [Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur](https://www.iitk.ac.in).

Jai is developing probabilistic generative models and inference techniques for neuroimaging data, with applications in diagnosis and prognosis of neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer's.
